name: Lizr
description:
Randomized levels with enemies and you play as a bubble spitting lizard.

This is a short demo I made before canceling the game. It has a few levels and an ending, but not a lot of content.

Default Controls:

  • Jump - Z
  • Attack - X
  • Pause - Space
  • Left/Right/Up/Down - Arrow keys
  • Randomize color palette - F1
